entry.title: On ASE 2019
entry.content:
Our lab’s latest journal paper, Interactive Semi-automated SpecificationMining for Debugging: An Experience Report, is accepted to be presented at journal first conference second track of ASE conference.

In that reserach project in close collaboration with our industry partner, we developed a novel debugging method using latest specification mining methods. The developers in the company found this method (and the tool developed along with it) a valuable asset and a useful asset in their toolbox.

I am looking forward to see you all in the conference and have some chat about it.
entry.summary: Our lab’s latest journal paper, Interactive Semi-automated SpecificationMining for Debugging: An Experience Report, is accepted to be presented at journal first conference second track of ASE conference.

entry.title: On ICSE 2019
entry.content:
I am happy to announce that we are going to participate in ICSE 2019 in Montréal.

Our lab was very productive in 2018 year and we had two accepted papers in the conference (and co-located conferences), one student volunteer, and two students on the mentorship workshop program.

We look forward to see you there!

Picture credit: Marc-Olivier Jodoin
entry.summary: I am happy to announce that we are going to participate in ICSE 2019 in Montréal.
